{"id":413021316,"lang":"python3","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1603644967,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/413021316/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"14.2 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode) -> ListNode:\n        def add(l1, l2, carry):\n            if not l1 and not l2:\n                return ListNode(carry) if carry > 0 else None\n            total = carry\n            if l1:\n                total += l1.val\n            if l2:\n                total += l2.val\n            l1 = l1.next if l1 else l1\n            l2 = l2.next if l2 else l2\n            node = ListNode(total % 10)\n            node.next = add(l1, l2, total // 10)\n            return node\n        return add(l1, l2, 0)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
